thanks to one and all for showering their love and affection and  making my journey come so far.

I wish I could fulfill her last wish.may her soul rest in peace.strength to the family.
Just when I came to know that maheeba's last wish was to see me.another news follows that she is no more. http://t.co/q5NMEzcMRp
Wishing u all a happy new year..God bless u all with all the happiness and prosperity this year.enjoy chesi jyagratha ga intiki vellandi

Feeling very happy.just concluded my son  ABHAY RAM s naming ceremony
Wishing Babai a speedy recovery.my request to all the fans..dnt worry guys the LION is fine.he will be back ROARING
Been away from twitter for a long time.i felt I should tweet today.we are blessed with a baby boy.thanks for all ur blessings.love u all
Good morning everyone.resting at home.u guys have a great day.
Happy birthday rana..have a great one
Leaving to mumbai in the night..shooting for zandu balm add from tom..back on the 13th..
God!!!!its so good to be back home.
Last day of shoot in badami..
Reached badami guys.so many memories of brindawanam here.came to shoot for brindawanam to badami..and now am here for shakti.back on the 7th
am here in hosepet till the 3rd..we shift to badami on the 3rd afternoon.shooting there till the 6th or 7th.back to hyd on the 8th or 9th.
hello people..sorry for not keeping in touch all these days..cant access twitter on my phone here in hosepet..shoots going great.
Last day of shoot in hyd..leaving for my outdoor schedule tom for 15 Days...
@jjake61 wishing u a great nd a happy birthday..have a blast
Just saw the i phone app jrntr..totally loved it..i wanna know who created it..
On my way to location..have a break from tom till the 21st..will leave to hampi and badami for shoot for 15 days afyer the break.
A very emotional 10year journey..god has been very kind..thanks to all of them who have loved nd blessed me in this journey so far..
Am nervous bout coming years..
Remember sitting home on 15nov 2000 nervous.wondering wht will happen..and today am nervous again..
Watching a prog on zee 24..feel so emotional about the whole journey..
3More days and am done with 10years of my acting career.started 2000nov 16 with ninnu choodalani.feel so blessed with all the love n support
Goodmorning everyone..shooting for shakti climax..all u guys have a great day too
Good morning everyone..shootin for shakthi climax..
Wishing everyone a happy diwali..god bless us all..
Done for the day guys..back home..not shooting tom..gonna have fun with family nd friends..
Back to shoot from today..was resting all day yesterday..caught up on some movies...enjoyed my one day break..
Not shooting today..chillin at home..
Done for the day..had a great shoot with balu garu nazar garu nd prabhu garu..back home..sitting outside nd enjoying the rain..
Started shooting for shakti after a long break..work all the way from today..
Shooting for shakthi today..2 to 3 hours of work..break till the 30th after todays work..
The venue from brindavanam celebrations is changed from guntur. will comfirm the venue by tomorrow. sorry guys
Looking forward for brindavanam celebration in guntur on the 30Th.
Good morning people.totally enjoying my break.will start shooting for shakti from the 31st.
@prakashraaj thanks..missing u in the celebrations...
Guys..brindavanam collected the alltime best in my career the first week..cant reveal the figures producer problem u see..ha ha ha.
Am so happy..everyone in the industry r saying that brindavanam is the biggest hit in my career so far..thanks to all of u..
Vijaya dashami subhakankshalu..wishing everyone a happy dasera
U can inform me about pirated cd's also and where ur getting them. Please help us by saying NO to piracy..KILL PIRACY
Let us all come together on this and save the telugu film industry. Hoping all of u will help.
Need a big favour from all u guys. Any information regarding online piracy of brindavanam please let me know..
Good morning everyone..feels so good in the morning..have some interviews.then shoot for shakti.break from tom.
I am so happy with the response..thanks for all the support love and affection..
I just cant believe it..thanks to everyone of u..am so happy..
Thanks for all the love and support..getting great reviews..its a team work..
God!!i have never been so nervous..brindavanam releases tom..
Finished watching brindavanam..wish i could keep watching it..gonna keep the excitement intact till the 14th..
Wishing jakkanna(rajamouli)a very happy birthday..
Hope u guys have a great nd a fabulous sunday..watching brindavanam today..very excited..
Goodmorning everyone.still shooting for the action sequence..very exiting to shoot..u guys have a great day too..god bless all..
Good morning.shooting for the interval action sequence for shakti from today.very complicated nd interesting action block.have a great day.
Brindavanam postponed to 14th..the reason being there is still some work which is pending..sorry guys..work pressure.see u guys on 14th
Shooting for one of my favourite action sequence in shakti...
Shooting in film city for shakti...
Resting today..will finish dubbing for brindavanam..
Shooting for shakti today..
missing my grandmother a lot..was very attached to her..
I think everyone knows by now that brindavanam is releasing on the 8th of oct..totally exited.
Good morning everyone..shooting for shakti in film city today..u guys have a great day..
Morning guys..shooting for shakti from today..feeling a little better today..had a fun filled night at prakash raajs house..
Feeling a little better today..gonna start shooting for shakti from tom..
Hey guys..sorry haven't kept in touch for two days.suffering with severe cough and cold.so just resting at home.
hope all of u liked my favourite nijamena????
will start shakthi from 19th..exited and tensed about brindavanam..
its tough to say goodbye to a good team..hope all of u liked the songs..
sorry for not keeping in touch guys..shot for a last cute scene with kota garu prakash annaya and srihari anna..as prakash anna said
had one of the best audio release function..loved evry second of it..hope u guys like the songs..resting at home..
done with the shoot..both for the song and brindawanam..coming back dayafter.
birthday boy rajuuuuuuuuuu http://twitpic.com/2mmfmb
wishing a great choreographer and a amazing friend RAJUSUNDARAM a very happy birthday..we gonna celebrate in swiss..
hey guys..shoots goin great here..two more days and am done with the song..and even brindawanam.will start shakti from the 19 of this month.
all exited to come back to hyd on the 12th..i reach in the morning and the audio function is in the evening.ballayya nd dad r attending..
second day of the most exiting shoot in brindawanam..cause its mah favourite song..
resting at hotel..sitting with the directer cameraman and choreographer raju sundaram..a very good friend..so peaceful here..
our base in switzerland interlaken..a very calm nd soothing place..
shooting for my favourite song in brindawanam..the name of the song in the album is NIJAMENA....
first day of shoot in swiss..god!its so beautiful here..coming here for the 4th time..but it feels like am here for the first time..
Done for the day..started shooting late but good work after we started.one more day in turkey..then we off to swiss..
Finally!!!!antalia..my journey ends here..the whole crew is so tired..good night people..
Landed in isthanbul..have to take a domestic flight to a place called antalia..very tired..
Just reached dubai..here for 2 hours..then to turkey..istanbul
Leaving to turkey and swiss...will try tweeting from there..all u guys have a great day..
Done for the day..just realised that dubbing can also tire u..
Thought it was a break..but realised I need to go dub..hmmm..I guess something is better than nothing..all u guys have a great day.
Last day of action..have a break tom..will be leaving to turkey and swiss on the 2nd for 10 days.
Good morning everyone...on my way to the location.2nd day of action..
Brindawanam release is on the 1st of october..and audio release is on the 12th of september.double checked it from the producer.
On my way to the location..last day of song..starting the action sequence tom.which stopped due to my injury..
Shooting in annapoorna studios today..two more days for the song.then leaving to turkey and switzerland on the 1st for brindawanam..
Just finished doing a tough step..god!!ee prem rakshit nannu champestunnadu..baboi..asalu ithanni parichayam chesinanduku rajamoulini anali.
@Actor_Siddharth I will bro
Shooting a song for brindawanam with prem rakshit..
All the momories have come back..we were so young.dnt know how gunashekar shot the film with kids scattered all over the place..
Last day of shoot in chalakudi..reaching hyd in the evening..shot at this very place when I was 12 for ramayanam.long time.
Reached cochin..45 min drive to chalakudi..that's where we will be shooting..
Leaving to cochin today..shooting from tom for two days..
Wishing all a happy independence day..
Dnt need to tell u guys about the mishap which happened yesterday..resting at home..nothing to worry..will rest for a week.
Wrapping up brindawanam this month..hectic schedules...shooting everyday till finish..
Second day of brindavanam climax scene..on my way to the location..
Good morning...shooting for brindawanam climax scene today with prakash raj and srihari..along with 20 artists..u guys have a great day.
Started shooting for brindawanam..all u guys have a great day...
Its so good being back home..home food..god!ate so much..
Just boarded the flight...god!am really happy am coming back.missed home a lot.
Done with the most hazardous schedule ever..driving to delhi now.6 hours..comin to hyd tom morning.will rest for a day.brindavanam from 6th
Last day of shoot..so exited am coming back to hyd tom..
Good morning everyone...reached haridwar late in the night yesterday.resting today.will start shooting from tom.u all have great day.
Ippatiki 12 hours journey aindi..three more hours to go.what a way to celebrate friendship day.
@reddyharsha wish u the same ra
Happy friendship day everyone..god bless all..on my way to haridwar..with meher.one of my best friends.we enjoying friendship day travelling
Done with my tiring days in manali..gonna shift to haridwar tom..will shoot there for two days..then back to hyd on the 5th.
@reddyharsha no harsha..its no fun..too gloomy..
Done for the day..very tired.gonna go workout nd crash.comin back to hyd on the 5th
But lemme tell u guys I was more exited seeing them..
A few telugu students came by to the location just when I packed up.guess they here for a holiday.they were very exited to see me.
There r some rumours goin on that am hurt..but am absolutely fine..
Done for the day..its raining here..god!manali is beautiful when it rains..enjoying it..
Good morning everyone..gonna go and bash up some goons today..u guys have a great day....
And everyone who have been asking me when is my film with rajamouli..I guess its jakkanna who should answer that..
Have been hearing great reports for maryada ramanna..congrats jakkanna..well that's wht I cal rajamouli..nd congrats sunil.
Shooting for a action sequence from today.
Hello everyone..sorry couldn't tweet for two days..these guys took me away to a location 9 hours away..came back to manali last night..
Good morning all..shooting going on great..manali is fun..weather too good.. http://twitpic.com/27h9qu
Ali.......... http://twitpic.com/276x96
Nenu
column4: venu madhav
column6: krishna bhagavan oka carlo unnamu..god these guys r funny...

text: Just landed in chandigadh..flight to manali got cancelled due to bad weather.goin to manali by road..300 km..god!!
Kaani life lo okkasari ladakh chudali mee andaru.its a beautiful place..
Leaving to manali tom.will shoot there for 10 days then will shift to haridwar..missed twitter..nd all u guys..miss hyd too.
Hello everyone...just reached delhi after a hectic schedule in ladakh.its a beautiful place though.but tough to shoot.oxygen levels very low
@LakshmiManchu thanks..will keep tht in mind..
On my way to the airport..will keep tweeting if I can in ladakh..till then.bye guys!!!!
@Actor_Siddharth sure bro..thanks a ton..
Leaving for my 25 days schedule for shakti today...ladakh kashmir haridwar...
@LakshmiManchu thought u were the one who's buying the bikes for us..ha ha
@Actor_Siddharth first help me to select one..
Loved the bikes...god!!!
On my way to harley davidson showroom..
Gonna attend the harley davidson showroom opening today in the evening..
Super exited...gonna watch the match at @sunnygunnam s house..go germany....
Sitting in the location with and totally enjoying the drizzle..and the music..shooting for a song for brindavanam...
On my way to maryada ramanna audio function..
Totally loving the match..germany nd argentina...
Done with shoot...gonna go home now nd workout...
Back to work..shooting for brindavanam at icrisat..my first time here..love this place..city madhayalo oka palleturila undi...
Sorry for the late tweets..last couple of days were very hectic...not shooting today..so its gonna be workout
column4: eat nd go back to sleep..

text: Back to work...shooting for brindavanam...will start shooting for shakti from the 10th..ladakh
column4: kashmir and haridwar...25 day schedule...

text: Bye vikarabad..done with my action sequence.am so tired..but gotta go home and workout..god!!!!!!!!
Third day of shoot in vikarabad..going good..might attend simha 50 days function tonight at  marriot..damn exited..
My directer my cameraman nd my twin action directors..vikarabad...... http://twitpic.com/1yn1id
Shooting in vikarabad forest..shakti unit left me here to shoot for brindawanam..
Just a week back I met his son..wonder why people need to go through so much pain..may his soul rest in peace..nd strength to his family
I am shocked with the news of great actor kota srinivasa rao garus son kota prasads sudden demise...its a big loss for the great actor..rip.
I have decided that I will not tweet tonight..only to protect rana's honour..
guys I think germany will win the fifa this time...
Akhil akhil akhil...fantastic..he was so good..I wish he was in lions
Done with fun yesterday..its only work from today..on my way to shoot..goodmorning all..
Totally tired..cramping very badly..that running between the wickets killed me..had great fun..back home..gonna crash for a bit now..
on my way to ballayyas function..
Happy birthday yuvarathna.....
Simhamanti chinnodey vetaki repu vastunnade..simha simha simha.......
Happy birthday ballayyyyyyaaaaaaa....in advance...attending ballayyas film opening tom..kotla vijayabhaskar reddy stadium..
Came to chagallu to attend vinay anna dads pedda karma...very sad..his father was really close to me..miss him a lot..may his soul rip..
Hyderabadlo weather rocks tonight...loving it totally..after a hard days shoot..this is wht I needed..
karamchedu..taruvatha mahanadu...enjoyed it..but damn tiring..shootin from tommorow.
For all the people who have been askin about brindavanam and shakthi..here is the info..brindavanam releases first followed by shakthi..
Ram is @ramsayz
Welcome raaaaaammm
Sad to know that vinay annas father passed away..may his soul rest in peace..
Response racchaaaa...never expected this....thank u alllllllllllllllllll......
I meant peter hein
Can't understand what's tougher..working in summer or working with peter...
never gotta thank veturi for vayyassunami......thank u veturi garu!!!!!!!!!
raalipoye puvva neeku raagalenduke......totamali nee todu ledule....veturiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii i miss u.............may ur soul rest in peace
